doc.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp

credit.role: Asks Hardin to do gun trick

doc.plot: Marshal Earp keeps the law, first in Kansas and later in Arizona, using his over-sized pistols and a variety of sidekicks. Most of the saga is based loosely on fact, with historical badguys and good guys, ending up with the famous shootout at the O.K. corral.
